Interactive Posters

As I started to get more confortable with creative coding languages like processing and p5.js for example, I developed a serie of interactive posters for a university project. I was experimenting with different graphic outcomes I was getting from processing and made it mouse reactive so the user could interact with the posters.
Datanator was an art installation I participated and created a few posters to promote it. The theme for the exhibition was internet glitch.
